# 2010 Peace Queen Cup

| count = 1
| second_other  =
| matches = 7
| goals = 9
| attendance =
| top_scorer =  Kate Gill(3 goals)
| player =  Jeon Ga-eul
| prevseason = 2008

}}
The 2010 Peace Queen Cup was the third and last edition of the Peace Queen Cup. It was held from 17 to 23 October 2010 in Suwon, South Korea.
